General.Name: Anhui Estone Materials Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Estone Materials Technology Co.,Ltd provides lithium battery coating, electronic communication functional filling, and low-smoke halogen-free flame-retardant materials. Its products are primarily used in new energy vehicles, consumer electronics, chips, copper clad laminates, and fire safety fields. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Bengbu, China.
